rules_text:
[i]Aircalibur[/i] – When Cecilia, Mage General of Etruria enters, return up to two other target creatures to their owner's hand.
[i][i]Rally[/i] Resistance[/i] – Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, creatures you control gain ward {1}.
[i]Physic[/i] – Whenever another creature enters, you gain 1 life.
